First of all thanks to Dr. Madhumita ji for making our first baby delivery very smooth even after complications during 36 weeks for pregnancy.

Today after 12 days, wife recover almost fully.

I definitely recommed all the expecting moms to plan delivery under Ma'am guidance.

Blessed to find her during our pregnancy journey 
It's very hard these time to find a dr like she is.

review: I had approached Dr. Madhumita for a simple infection and that is where my association with her began.
